resources.string: When I asked dad for money, he said: If money grew on trees, I would be a gardener. So I started watering him daily...
Mom said she had a secret recipe. Turned out it was just adding love and a lot of fish sauce.
Teacher: Why are you looking at your watch during the exam? Me: Because it has the answers... of the time.
Boss: Do you believe in life after work? I said: I will if I ever see it.
I told my phone I lost my sense of humor. It replied: I can’t help with that, but here’s a meme.
